1985 he joined BSB Software as a Managing Partner where he was responsible for a number of projects in various industries in Europe, Asia and Australia.

In 1994 he joined the German mobile provider D Plus as Director IT and Software Development before he became Manager Sales Support at EDS Electronic Data Systems in 1996.

After four years he took on a new challenge at Broadnet Germany. As Director for IT & Processes he built up the IT-Department and on top was responsible for Business Processes and Customer Service. Later on JÃ¼rgen acted as Director Business Development where he headed activities in new markets.
